Class ProductSale

java.lang.Object
model.ProductSale
public class ProductSale extends Object
Represents a sale/discount on a product or category. Can be percentage-based or fixed amount discount. Supports both individual product discounts and category-wide discounts.
Version:
2.0
Author:
BENITO_RAMOS

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductSale

      public ProductSale(String saleID, String targetID, String discountType, double discountValue, LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate)
      Constructs a ProductSale with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      saleID - The unique identifier for this sale
      targetID - The product ID or category code (e.g., "P-0001" or "ALL-F")
      discountType - The type of discount ("PERCENTAGE" or "FIXED")
      discountValue - The discount amount (0-100 for percentage, or fixed amount)
      startDate - The date and time when the sale begins
      endDate - The date and time when the sale ends

  • Method Details

    • isCurrentlyActive

      public boolean isCurrentlyActive()
      Checks if the sale is currently active based on date/time and active status.
      Returns:
      true if the sale is active and current date/time is within the sale period

    • calculateDiscountedPrice

      public double calculateDiscountedPrice(double originalPrice)
      Calculates the discounted price for a given original price. Applies percentage or fixed amount discount based on discount type.
      Parameters:
      originalPrice - The original price before discount
      Returns:
      The discounted price (never less than 0)

    • getDiscountAmount

      public double getDiscountAmount(double originalPrice)
      Gets the discount amount for a given original price.
      Parameters:
      originalPrice - The original price before discount
      Returns:
      The amount saved by the discount

    • appliesTo

      public boolean appliesTo(Product product)
      Checks if this sale applies to a given product. Handles both direct product ID matches and category-wide sales.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to check
      Returns:
      true if the sale applies to this product

    • getDisplayString

      public String getDisplayString()
      Returns a formatted display string for the sale. Includes sale ID, target, discount amount, date range, and status.
      Returns:
      A formatted string representation of this sale

    • getSaleID

      public String getSaleID()
      Gets the sale ID.
      Returns:
      The unique sale identifier

    • setSaleID

      public void setSaleID(String saleID)
      Sets the sale ID.
      Parameters:
      saleID - The new sale ID

    • getTargetID

      public String getTargetID()
      Gets the target ID (product ID or category code).
      Returns:
      The target ID

    • setTargetID

      public void setTargetID(String targetID)
      Sets the target ID.
      Parameters:
      targetID - The new target ID

    • getDiscountType

      public String getDiscountType()
      Gets the discount type.
      Returns:
      The discount type ("PERCENTAGE" or "FIXED")

    • setDiscountType

      public void setDiscountType(String discountType)
      Sets the discount type.
      Parameters:
      discountType - The new discount type

    • getDiscountValue

      public double getDiscountValue()
      Gets the discount value.
      Returns:
      The discount value (percentage 0-100 or fixed amount)

    • setDiscountValue

      public void setDiscountValue(double discountValue)
      Sets the discount value.
      Parameters:
      discountValue - The new discount value

    • getStartDate

      public LocalDateTime getStartDate()
      Gets the sale start date and time.
      Returns:
      The start date/time

    • setStartDate

      public void setStartDate(LocalDateTime startDate)
      Sets the sale start date and time.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The new start date/time

    • getEndDate

      public LocalDateTime getEndDate()
      Gets the sale end date and time.
      Returns:
      The end date/time

    • setEndDate

      public void setEndDate(LocalDateTime endDate)
      Sets the sale end date and time.
      Parameters:
      endDate - The new end date/time

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Checks if the sale is active.
      Returns:
      true if active, false otherwise

    • setActive

      public void setActive(boolean active)
      Sets the active status of the sale.
      Parameters:
      active - The new active status
